stage.welcome_msg:
Ohayou Gozaimasu!
Welcome to Cerberus Testing! Thank you for taking the time to test this system out.
Just sit back, relax, and enjoy the first round of this mock contest. :)
Each question will only have one possible answer.

choose.q: What does the ME in JavaME stand for?
Latest client version of Microsoft's line of Windows product is:
This is a set of tools with a managed runtime environment provided by Microsoft that facilitates computer game development and management.
How many bytes are there in a binary kilobyte (KB or KiB)?
This is a free and open source web browser managed by Mozilla Corporation
Computer programs that allow higher-level computer programs to interact with hardware are called:
An object-oriented programming language developed at Sun Microsystems in the early 1990s.

choose.choice: Processes that can be run in parallel.

choose.q: This refers to the empirical observation that the number of transistors that can be inexpensively placed on an integrated circuit doubles approximately every two years.
When using Category 5e cables for Ethernet networks without repeaters, the cable's length is normally limited to:
This is a type of non-photorealistic rendering designed to make computer graphics appear hand-drawn.
Which of the following has only ONE binary representation of the number (0) if used to represent a signed integer?
This is a piece of code that accesses a shared resource and must not be concurrently accessed by more than one thread of execution
Recognized as the father of digital art by Smithsonian Institution's monthly magazine publication, who created the first computer art in 1964
